TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {204259=Rohit Ferro Tec is in the Mining & Minerals sector. The current market capitalisation stands at Rs 75.21 crore. The company management includes Suresh Kumar Patni - Non Executive Chairman, Rohit Patni - Managing Director, Dinesh Biyanee - Executive Director - Works, Jatindra Nath Rudra - Ind. Non-Executive Director, Ankit Rungta - Additional Director, Sujata Agarwal - Additional Director. It is listed on the BSE with a BSE Code of 532731 and the NSE with an NSE Code of ROHITFERRO. Its Registered office is at 35, Chittaranjan Avenue , Kolkata,West Bengal - 700012.
